Fulfillment with Non-Negotiable Criteria.description:
The candidate brings 7+ years of hands-on Java experience with strong OOP, collections, multithreading, Spring Boot, REST API design, and relational databases.  
   Missing explicit mention of Git, Maven/Gradle, and agile methodologies prevents a perfect score.

Fulfillment with Negotiable Criteria.description:
Demonstrates solid microservices and distributed systems background in a PKI context.  
   No evidence of cloud (AWS/Azure/GCP), messaging queues (Kafka/RabbitMQ), Docker, or AI/ML exposure.

Continuity and Recency of Experience.description:
Has been in Java/Spring development roles continuously since May 2016, currently leading microservices projects as a Senior Engineer.  
   Recent work includes Spring Boot, Hibernate, Tomcat upgrades, HSM integrations, and full-lifecycle delivery.
